creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: two panel lined skirt with wide light blue waistband; warp style with two wide embroidered dragon panels in elaborate designs in metal and blue silk threads on white satin ground; four small embroidered birds in corners; black border on side and lower edges; 24 narrow white bands separated by black strips with elaborate alternating bird and dragon embroidery in shades of blue and metallic threads
title: Skirt
